alert.note: Alert for Mobile Central; Mobile Coastal (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 19 at 12:18PM CDT by NWS Mobile
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southwestern Mobile County through 115 PM CDT... At 1218 PM CDT, National Weather Service doppler radar indicated strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 5 miles east of Big Point to 6 miles east of Theodore. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Tillmans Corner, Theodore, Grand Bay, Bayou La Batre, Coden, I10 And I65 and Alabama Port. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
